explanation: This is a email input question and will give the user a normal text input keyboard, with @ symbol making it easier to entry emails, it should be used for things like First name
label: email Address
name: email
helpText: This is your email address we can use to communicate with you, for example john@example.com

errors.message: This is a required field and must be filled in
You must enter a valid email address, there is something wrong with what you have entered
